(ICON BY THE ARTIST 
11thsense0)  I'm just a Inspiring Novelist with to much time on my hands.

summary: Hey listen- I know imma be wrong come later eps of critical role. But nothing will be more stressful than the start of campaign...
body:
Hey listen- I know imma be wrong come later eps of critical role. But nothing will be more stressful than the start of campaign 2. Because everyone hated each other and no one trusted anyone. But with an insta character death and pending war. Pushed all these assholes together.

Hell even the stress of the character were rubbing off on viewers and that shit was just tasty. Althought i am happy the drama is pretty much gone. From most area, not all is clear but most places.

tags: weeps openly about how much I love this show + these people
they deserve the absolute world in my eyes
summary: I could spend the rest of my life trying to find the words to articulate how grateful I am, how full of inspiration, how full of...
caption:
I could spend the rest of my life trying to find the words to articulate how grateful I am, how full of inspiration, how full of hope and love and creativity I feel thanks to the existence of Critical Role and never find the right combination.

happy 4th anniversary to this absolutely beautiful, absolutely impossible show.
here’s to many more to come!

reblog.comment:
I could spend the rest of my life trying to find the words to articulate how grateful I am, how full of inspiration, how full of hope and love and creativity I feel thanks to the existence of Critical Role and never find the right combination.

happy 4th anniversary to this absolutely beautiful, absolutely impossible show.
here’s to many more to come!

trail.content_raw:
I could spend the rest of my life trying to find the words to articulate how grateful I am, how full of inspiration, how full of hope and love and creativity I feel thanks to the existence of Critical Role and never find the right combination.

happy 4th anniversary to this absolutely beautiful, absolutely impossible show.
here’s to many more to come!
trail.content:
I could spend the rest of my life trying to find the words to articulate how grateful I am, how full of inspiration, how full of hope and love and creativity I feel thanks to the existence of Critical Role and never find the right combination.

happy 4th anniversary to this absolutely beautiful, absolutely impossible show.
here’s to many more to come!

blog.name: thegriffin-blakefamily
blog.title: And Now You're Home
blog.description: Erin. I would defend Clarke Griffin with my life. Probably 59% The 100, 40% Critical Role, and 1% random nonsense. Not spoiler-free. Bellarke and Fjorester trash. I play video games, read a lot of books, and write. (Other fandoms may include, but are not limited to: Star Wars, GOT, Anne with an E, Crazy Ex-Girlfriend, Stranger Things, Veronica Mars, B99, Superstore)

tags: what do i do with my hands?
where am i supposed to look?
what about blushing because that'll definitely happen
this isn't like work where i can be a functional human because i have to be
chances are i just clam up and shut down emotionally
summary: So, I've never really gone to a con before, but I'm going to Emerald City Comicon this weekend. I have autographs set up with...
body: So, I’ve never really gone to a con before, but I’m going to Emerald City Comicon this weekend. I have autographs set up with the Critical Role cast, but like… what are you supposed to say when you’re there? I am Not Good at social interaction and I know you only have like 30 seconds, so I’m starting to get a little nervous.

reblog.comment: So, I’ve never really gone to a con before, but I’m going to Emerald City Comicon this weekend. I have autographs set up with the Critical Role cast, but like… what are you supposed to say when you’re there? I am Not Good at social interaction and I know you only have like 30 seconds, so I’m starting to get a little nervous.

trail.content_raw: So, I’ve never really gone to a con before, but I’m going to Emerald City Comicon this weekend. I have autographs set up with the Critical Role cast, but like… what are you supposed to say when you’re there? I am Not Good at social interaction and I know you only have like 30 seconds, so I’m starting to get a little nervous.
trail.content: So, I’ve never really gone to a con before, but I’m going to Emerald City Comicon this weekend. I have autographs set up with the Critical Role cast, but like… what are you supposed to say when you’re there? I am Not Good at social interaction and I know you only have like 30 seconds, so I’m starting to get a little nervous.

summary:
Do not stand at my grave and cry, I am not there, I did not die. 
(Mary Elizabeth Frye)
A quick warm-up sketch cus feelings....
